text: Li Jijun (, October 9, 1933 - July 21, 2020), was a Chinese geographer and geomorphologist. He was born in Pengzhou, Sichuan. In 1991, he was elected as a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He was a professor of Geography Department of Lanzhou University and a Dean of the Geography Department of Lanzhou University. Li died on July 21, 2020 in Lanzhou, Gansu at the age of 87.哀悼！“大先生”李吉均院士逝世 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese scientists Category:Asian geographers Category:Chinese academics
title: Li Jijun
